metadata.raw:
Nergal Class Battleship (Military Starship)

The Nergal was designed as a follow-on to the successful Osprey class following the Fifth Frontier War. Since it was determined that the Jump-3 capability of the Osprey was seldom required in actual usage, the Nergal was built with Jump-2 drives, allowing a larger proportion of the ship to be used for fuel and power plant.

CraftID: Nergal class Battleship, TL15, MCr172100
